name: chat-app-frontend
description: Frontend for Chat App using Next.js

scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:static
scripts.deploy:static: mkdir -p .next/standalone/.next/static && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/ && cp -r public .next/standalone/ && cp .next/BUILD_ID .next/standalone/.next/ && cp .next/*.json .next/standalone/.next/
